title: The Value Of Life
opening: Hector gains the upper hand in the battle of Valor. Taking the lead, Hector moves straight toward the Dragon’s Gate. Before his eyes, eerie ruins appear. What could they be? Are they connected to Nergal? If they overlook any enemy lurking within, they could be attacked from the rear. Without pause, they open the rusty steel door and step inside…

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: There are still some morphs left? So this must be Nergal’s doing, too.

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: Hey, Lord Hector! It’s that weird power again... Like in the ruins below the desert. That area where magic was nullified.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Hector, what are you talking about? What’s a magic seal?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: I don’t know... I don’t know too much about it.

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: What’s going on? It feels different than last time. In the desert, its energy felt so hostile... Now, it feels more like ...sorrow?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: I don’t know who they are, but it looks like they’re after a fight. Show them no mercy! Let’s go!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: We beat it. But what was it? We saw it here once before, and then under the desert. Was that the same creature?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: After that final blow, its body crumbled into dust.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Yeah. That’s the same thing that happened to those morphs.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: So this thing... This magic seal was a morph, too? But it didn’t look anything like the rest of them.

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: But it was still a morph. When it died... I heard its voice call out... It called out a name... Nergal. Did you hear its voice? Sorrow... It was filled with a terrible sorrow.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Everybody, are you ready? Once we get through here, it’s on to the Dragon’s Gate and the final battle! Here we go! Time to crush Nergal’s ambitions!!
